title: Baba Rahman travels for Schalke medical ahead of Chelsea exit
description: Chelsea defender Baba Rahman is on his way for a medical at Schalke, according to Sky in Germany.
content: Contract negotiations between the two clubs are ongoing, with Schalke hoping to land the player on an 18-month loan deal.Rahman spent last season on loan with the Bundesliga club, making 13 appearances for Schalke as they finished 10th in Germany's top flight.The Ghana international still has a house in Gelsenkirchen and Schalke head coach Dominico Tedesco believes it will be straightforward to secure the 23-year-old's signature once the two clubs reach an agreement."When we get the go-ahead from Chelsea, it won't take more than a minute to talk with Baba," said Tedesco.Rahman signed for Chelsea in 2015 from FC Augsburg for a fee of in excess of Â£20m, playing 23 games during his short spell at Stamford Bridge.The left-back could follow Kenedy out of west London with the Brazilian leaving Chelsea on Tuesday to join Newcastle on loan until the end of the season.In a bid to replace the duo, Sky in Italy understand Chelsea are close to signing left-sided defender Emerson Palmieri from Roma in a potential double swoop including Edin Dzeko.
